channel.title: Skill Cape Requirements
channel.description: How do I make my skillcape requirements because Ive added all the extra capes to my server buy you dont need a requirement. Please Help

item.title: Skill Cape Requirements
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

[quote=“Legendery, post:2, topic:139724”]It’s Not EXACTLY This But LIKE It, Fix It Yourself, Isn’t Hard, Im Not Going Through My Client.java, Sorry.

Case #### If Playerlevel[#] == 99 then = true; } else { False;[/quote]
i just lol’ed at that

Read full topic

item.title: Skill Cape Requirements
item.dc:creator: @fireman7778 fireman7778
item.description:
@fireman7778 wrote:

firstly, you will be editing your client.java

search for

} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Iron”)) {
return 1;

you should see it with steel, adament, and rune

now the format for a different item that isnt already in the server is.

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("####")) {
return ##;

now the 1st #'s are the id of the item, and the seceond are the def lvl
this is only for def requirements, im working on making it other lvls, i just forgot others} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“7650”)) {
return 99;

this code would be def cape and 99 def required.

hope that helps a bit, try and edit to make it work with other skills

i think legendendery has it right for others.

Read full topic
